intro: Ultramarines Legion armies gain 120 formation points (F/p), 60 upgrade points (U/p), 40 Titan points (T/p), and 40 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle. A negative U/p value means that you gain that many upgrade points for taking a particular formation.
strategy: Legiones Astartes armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: All Legiones Astartes Detachments and Collegia Titanica allied Banners have an initiative of 1+. Astartes Automata Detachments have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Machine Spirit' special rule. Solar Auxilia allied Sections have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Army of Mankind' special rule. Questoris Familia allied Lances have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Chivalry' special rule.
armyRules: The Dauntless special rule applies to all Ultramarines Legion Detachments and Collegia Titanica Banners.

sections.name: Ultramarines Core Detachments
sections.description: Ultramarines Legion armies must have at least one Core Detachment.

formations.name: Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Tactical Legionaries - Melta
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian - Thaumaturgy (5 U/p), or with a Supreme Commander (0-1 in the army, 0 U/p)
Add Tactical Legionaries - Melta: 10 U/p
Add Support Legionaries - Plasma, or two Heavy Support Legionaries - Missile Launcher: 10 U/p
Add two Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any type: 10 U/p
Add two Cataphractii Terminators - Melta: 15 U/p

formations.name: Mechanized Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Tactical Legionaries - Melta, two Rhinos
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian - Thaumaturgy (5 U/p), or with a Supreme Commander (0-1 in the army, 0 U/p)
Add two Tactical Legionaries - Melta and a Rhino: 10 U/p
Add two Assault Legionaries: 10 U/p
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with four Support Rhino - Melta, and/or Support Rhino - Missile Launcher: 5 U/p each
Replace up to two Rhinos in the formation with two Land Raider Proteus: 5 U/p each
Replace up to two Rhinos in the formation with one Spartan of any type: 5 U/p each
